pm25.name: Particulate Matter 2.5
pm25.description: Fine inhalable particles with diameter ≤ 2.5 microns. Major health risk.
pm25.healthImpact: Penetrates deep into lungs; causes respiratory and cardiovascular diseases.

pm10.name: Particulate Matter 10
pm10.healthImpact: Causes throat irritation, breathing issues, allergies.

o3.name: Ozone
o3.healthImpact: Triggers asthma and reduces lung function.

co.name: Carbon Monoxide
co.healthImpact: Reduces oxygen supply in the body.
